titles.title: Permanent IRA Charitable Contribution Act of 2014
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the rule allowing certain tax-free distributions from individual retirement accounts for charitable purposes.
Permanent IRA Charitable Contribution Act of 2014

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 23 - 14.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Ways and Means. H. Rept. 113-496.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 369.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: Permanent IRA Charitable Contribution Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the exclusion from gross income of distributions from individual retirement accounts (IRAs) for charitable purposes.
